CHAPTER.VERS: A khangham bel keimah Johan inTeeltuam ahi, kong it taktak tonu le na pawlpi mite kiangah lai ka hong gelh hi. Kei bek in a hong it hi loin thuman a thei taktakte khempeuh in zong hong it uh hi.
Thuman thei ihih manin a tawntungin tua thu-ah i kip ding hi.
Pa Pasian le a Tapa Jesuh Khrih in dikna, hehpihna le nopsakna, eite tungah hong pia henla, thuman le itna tawh tua thuphate khempeuh eite a’ hong hi tahen.
Pa Pasian in eite hong thupiakna bangmahin na pawlpi mite pawlkhat in thu a mantakin a zuihna uh mu ka hih manin ka nuam mahmah hi.

Tua ahih ciangin ka hong it tonu aw, ka hong thum nopna panin: Eite khempeuh khatlekhat ki-it ni, cihna ahi hi. Hih kong gen thu pen thuthak hi lo a, a kipatcil pek a kipanin i neihsa thupiakna ahi hi.
Itna thu kong gen ciangin Pasian’ thupiakte zui ding cihna ahi hi. A kipat cil a kipan na zaksa uh ahi hih thupiakna pen na khan tawntungun zui-in itna na nei ta un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh leitungah midangte a khem tampi hong omta a, tua mite in Jesuh Khrih, mihing banga hong paina thu a nial uh hi. Tua bang mite pen mi khemte hi a, Khrih’ Gal ahi uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin na sepsa uh thuman taankha loin, a kimtakin na ngah theih nadingun limtakin kidawm un.
Khrih’ thuhilhna zui loin a khengvalin a pai mite pen Pasian tawh a kipawl lo ahi hi.Ahi zongin a thuhilhna a zuite pen Pa Pasian le a Tapa tawh a kipawl ahi uh hi.
Tua ahih manin Khrih’ hilh ahi hih thute a hilh lo midang khatpeuh note kiangah a hong pai leh na inn uhah zong na tungsak kei unla, zong na hopih kei un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh tua bang mite ading thupha a deihsak mite pen amau’ nasep hoih lohna-ah zong a kipawl ahi uh hi.
Gen ding tampi ka neihlai hangin lai-in hong gelh lo zaw-in, eite’ lungdamna a kicin zawk theih nadingin kei hong pai-in khatlekhat maitang kimu-in thu genkhawm dingin ka kingaihsun hi.
Teeltuam ahi hih lai-a om pawlpi mite in hopihna kam hong khak uh hi.
